name: QT's Cells
description:
You are QT-3.14. A small robot who's power generator has broken down! For 10 days, you'll have to scavenge the world for new power cells to keep yourself running.

There are 3 possible endings. If you get stuck trying to find certain endings, remember that you can always choose to just do nothing.

This short, single-player adventure game was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 46 Jam! The theme was "Keep It Alive."

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/qts-cells

All graphics, sounds, and code were made by me.

Controls:

- Arrows: Move QT around.

- X: Interact with objects, pick up items, and speed up text

- ESC: Pause the game
